description: Architectural detail sheet with stairway cross-sections (Section A and B), stairway guard railing and handrail notes, fire-rated ceiling/floor assembly detail, 1-hour fire-rated exterior wall detail, fire-rated eave assembly section, wall assembly penetration detail (U.L. System 604), sound transmission notes, and accessibility grab bar details for water closet and shower. 7 numbered detail zones plus 2 building sections. Red 'APPROVED' stamp present.
key_content: Section A: stairway cross-section showing existing garage below, new ADU above — R-30 insulation at roof/ceiling, R-19 insulation at walls
Section B: perpendicular stairway cross-section showing living room above, stairway, R-19 wall insulation
Roofing: Class 3 composition shingles, drip edge extends 4" into roof, shadow board, galvanized drip edge with kick-out flashing
Building paper: 30# self-sealing
Stairway guard railing: 34" min height at stairs, 36"-38" at porches/balconies/raised floors (CBC 1015)
Guard baluster spacing: shall not permit 4-3/8" sphere to pass through (CBC 1015.5)
Stairway handrail height: 34" min to 38" max (CBC 1012.4)
Handrail extension: 12" horizontally beyond top riser, continues to slope one tread depth beyond bottom riser (CBC 1012.6)
Handrail clearance: 1-1/2" min clear space between handrail and wall (CBC 1012.6)
1 HR fire-rated exterior wall assembly: 7/8" cement plaster (or 1/2" gypsum sheathing min), building paper, 2x4 studs @ 16" O.C., (1) layer 5/8" Type X GWB min on interior
Fire caulking required at penetrations in fire-rated wall
Fire-rated ceiling/floor assembly detail: carpet/pad, floor sheathing, floor joists, resilient channel, GWB ceiling
Fire-rated eave assembly: rafter, sheathing, 30# building paper, composition shingles, drip edge, shadow board
Wall assembly penetration detail: U.L. System No. 604 — firestop with approved listed materials per ASTM E814
Electrical outlet boxes on opposite sides of fire-rated walls: separated by min 24" horizontal distance
Sound transmission at floor-ceiling assemblies: STC rating per CBC 1207, min STC 50 (IIC 45/50)
Wall-mounted foldable grab bar for water closet (accessibility detail)
Wall-mounted shower grab bars (accessibility detail)
